name: WordPress Signature
author: Abinav Thakuri

sections.description: The WordPress Signature plugin allows wordpress users to have signatures below every post.This is almost similar to forum signatures where you can have a default signature on every post you make.The plugin is still being developed and the signature need html formating to appear properly.This means tags like <br> before the signature and anchor tags for links.This will be made easier in future versions.
sections.installation:
1. Extract and Upload the wp-signature folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to Tools >> WpSignature to utilize the plugin.
sections.faq:
Why does the signature come within the post and not below?

I am working on it and it will be automatically formatted in later versions.Please use tags like <br> for now.
sections.changelog: An upgraded version is on its way.
